Question: In the 2005 movie 'Black', who replaced A. R. Rahman as the composer?
Options:
A. Monty Sharma
B. Rahul Sharma
C. Anu Malik
D. Pritam

Question: In the 2005 movie 'Black', which song is the only one that contains lyrics in its soundtrack?
Options:
A. A. Haan Maine Chukar Dekha Hai
B. B. Tum Hi Ho
C. C. Tujhe Kitna Chahne Lage
D. D. Kabira
Answer: A. Haan Maine Chukar Dekha Hai

Options:
A. A.R. Rahman
B. Monty Sharma
C. Pritam
D. Vishal-Shekhar

D. D. Vishal-Shekhar

B. B. Monty Sharma

D. D. Sanjay Leela Bhansali
